attributes.action: Sack expenses cheats and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the total loss of confidence in MP's by most people, it is time to let the people decide who they want in power.  We would like to elect our prime minister, rather than endure somebody else's hand-me-down's.  We would like to elect honest MP's, not corrupt, greedy, hypocrites.  It is our right and our choice.  Don't leave it to the Queen to decide - have some dignity, before the people turn.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
